summary: Implements a streaming speaker diarization pipeline that keeps a short‑term memory of past audio, segments incoming speech using VAD timestamps, extracts speaker embeddings on‑the‑fly, updates speaker counts and clusters in real time, and produces consistent speaker labels for each segment.
business_intent: Enable real‑time speaker identification in live audio streams for use cases such as live meeting transcription, call‑center monitoring, broadcast captioning, and any application requiring immediate speaker turn tracking.
